name: hermes-class
description: A classtrophobic inspired approach to define to define Hermes compatible classes

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:index && npm run fix:default && npm run test
scripts.hermes: cat esm/index.js | sed 's/export default/const Class =/' > test/hermes.js && echo 'const console={assert(e,m){if(!e)print(m);}};' >> test/hermes.js && cat test/index.js | sed 's/const Class = .*//' >> test/hermes.js
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck

author: Andrea Giammarchi
